Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is an free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like GMail, Clevergo, Walla, Mail.com, Meta, Libero, Popstarmail, Freemail, Lycos, Apropo, Rambler, Aussiemail, FastMail, Live/Hotmail, Yahoo!, Terra, Azet, Mynet.com, Abv, Gawab, Atlas, YouTube, Hushmail, Techemail, Mail.ru, Mail.in, Uk2, Kids, IndiaTimes, Bordermail, Pochta, Canoe, LinkedIn, Virgilio, OperaMail, Doramail, GMX.net, Grafitti, Inet, Rediff, Bigstring, KataMail, Yandex, India, Zapakmail, Nz11, Interia, Sapo.pt, Inbox.com, Web.de, AOL, Care2, Evite, Wp.pt, Netaddress, Mail2World, O2, 5Fm or social portals like Xing, Xuqa, Flixster, Mydogspace, Kincafe, Lovento, Plurk, Mevio, Ning, Livejournal, Cyworld, Multiply, Famiva, Orkut, Bebo, Meinvz, Skyrock, Plaxo, Faces, Friendfeed, Fdcareer, Konnects, Koolro, Last.fm, NetLog, Bookcrossing, Flingr, Tagged, Friendster, Brazencareerist, Facebook, Perfspot, Twitter, Vkontakte, Mycatspace, Motortopia, Vimeo, Xanga, Flickr, Badoo, Hyves, Plazes, MySpace, Eons, Hi5. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like RoundCube, PHPMELODY, Buddy Zone, PunBB, Joomla, symfony, phpizabi, nowFire, JamRoom, Atmail5, Wordpress, joovili, Boonex Dolphin, myBB, Social Engine, PhpBB, jamit job, Drupal, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), Vwebmail, phpFoX, Joomla1.0, vBulletin, Dating Pro. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
